title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.13.0.5 发布
author: AzureZeng
txt_content:
本帖最后由 AZWorld 于 2019-8-8 15:09 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。Minecraft 基岩版 1.13 仍未发布，1.13.0.5 为其第 4 个测试版。转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

Fixes:
修复内容:
Crashes/Performance
崩溃/性能
Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay
修复了在游戏期间可能出现的崩溃问题Fixed a crash on Xbox One that could sometimes occur when signing out of an Xbox Live account
修复了在 Xbox One 上注销 Xbox Live 账号时可能造成的崩溃Fixed an issue that could sometimes result in the app not responding when loading on Android
修复了一个可能导致 Android 设备上读取(Minecraft)时出现未响应的问题Fixed a crash that could occur when interacting with custom entities
修复了与自定义实体互动时可能造成的崩溃Fixed a crash that could sometimes occur after sleeping in a bed
修复了在床上睡觉后有可能触发的崩溃Applying a resource pack to a Realm no longer causes the game to freeze
当向 Realm 应用资源包时不会再导致游戏未响应(冻结)Optimised game loading on Android devices, which also fixes the game sometimes showing an “App Not Responding” message when trying to launch the game
优化了 Android 设备上的读取游戏的过程，同时修复了有时尝试启动游戏时收到“程序未响应”的提醒
General
常规
VR - When player goes to sleep and wakes up in immersion mode, the HUD is now positioned correctly, and axe animations work again
VR(虚拟现实) - 当玩家在沉浸模式下睡觉或醒来时，HUD 现在能显示在正确的位置，并且斧头的动画恢复正常了Tweaked Marketplace layout to prevent overlapping information
调整了“商店”界面的布局，来防止重叠信息出现Controller mapping no longer show incorrectly as "unassigned"
控制器映射(键位)设置不会再错误的显示“未指派键位”了

Gameplay
游戏玩法/体验
Armor, weapons, and tools are once again suggested in the recipe book
盔甲，武器，工具再次能在配方书中找到了Mobs once again drop equipment as loot (MCPE-48891)
生物掉落物又会掉落装备了(MCPE-48891)Fixed an issue with breaking blocks when boarding a boat or holding a bow or crossbow
修复了坐在船上或者拿着弓/弩破坏方块时出现的问题Mobs no longer drop fully repaired items as loot (MCPE-45953)
生物掉落物将不会再掉落完整耐久度的物品了(MCPE-45953)End Gateway Portals will no longer generate on the main obsidian platform in the End
末地折跃门不会在末地的主黑曜石平台上生成了Arrows are no longer fired backwards when shooting at the ground
箭在射击到地面时不会再朝反方向射出了Leaves on trees no longer get cut off on chunk boundaries during terrain generation
世界生成时，在树上的叶子不会再被区块边界切掉了Players can no longer push lit TNT entities
玩家不能再推动点燃的 TNT 实体了

Mobs
生物(暴徒<--你们尽情的锤我吧!)
Dolphins now follow players in boats
海豚现在可以跟踪坐在船上的玩家了Fish and Dolphins with 'FollowFlock' goal state no longer stop moving in the water (MCPE-47868)
带有"目标"状态的鱼和海豚不会在水中停止移动(MCPE-47868)Fixed fishing float texture (MCPE-49727)
修复了钓鱼竿钓钩的材质(MCPE-49727)Fixed elytra left wing flipped model issue (MCPE-49589)
修复了鞘翅左翼漂浮模型的问题(MCPE-49589)

Graphical
图形
Fixed arm movement animation when switching between items in first person view (MCPE-47939)
修复了在第一人称视角下切换物品时出现的手臂移动动画问题(MCPE-47939)Fixed player missing right arm issue in VR mode
修复了在 VR 模式下玩家缺失右臂的问题

User Interface
用户界面
Resized the highlighted area in the create world menu, which was slightly too big
重新调整了“创建世界”菜单的高亮区域的大小(原先有点太大了)

 Add-Ons and Script Engine
Add-Ons 和 脚本引擎
Fixed player entity components (eg. minecraft:damage_sensor) that were not getting added
添加了未添加的玩家实体组件(例如 minecraft:damage_sensor)Fixed dog fetching mechanic on Dogs Marketplace content. Was caused by a ride attacking it's rider so prevented the melee attack goal from doing that
修复了商城内容中有关狗的内容中，狗的枚举机制。这个问题由于一个骑行实体攻击被骑的实体造成的，所以这个修复防止这个问题导致的混乱的攻击目标Custom player armor now renders correctly in some Marketplace content worlds
自定义玩家盔甲现在能正确渲染了(在部分商店内容的世界)
